channel.title: Tiny Houses on Sustainable Community Development Hub
channel.description: Recent content in Tiny Houses on Sustainable Community Development Hub

item.title: Astounding Tiny House With Downstairs Master Bedroom
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RYDIi9d9_N0 Living Big In A Tiny House Published on Jul 13, 2017 SUBSCRIBED 451K If you don’t like the idea of climbing into a loft to go to bed, this may be the tiny house design for you. At only 24ft, it’s amazing what this family have managed to fit into this home. One of the most unique features about this home is the bedrooms, with two available loft areas, this home also has a master bedroom which is located downstairs.

item.title: Astounding Tiny House With Downstairs Master Bedroom
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RYDIi9d9_N0 Living Big In A Tiny House Published on Jul 13, 2017 SUBSCRIBED 451K If you don’t like the idea of climbing into a loft to go to bed, this may be the tiny house design for you. item.title: Boat Builders Incredible 20ft Shipping Container Home
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sPgjndFqqwY Living Big In A Tiny House Published on Aug 10, 2016 SUBSCRIBED 451K SUBSCRIBE SUBSCRIBED UNSUBSCRIBE A 20ft Shipping Container can be a challenging space to work with when constructing a home. Thankfully, with years of experience building super-yachts and racing boats, shipwright Evans is no stranger to working in small spaces and when it came to building his own home he has done a truly spectacular job of, quite literally, thinking inside the box.

item.title: Cargo Trailer Conversion to Camper
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AH-0KcvZ5jI Bobby Published on Nov 20, 2016 SUBSCRIBE 1.5K SUBSCRIBE SUBSCRIBED UNSUBSCRIBE Bought from: Circle C Trailers in Prattville, AL Trailer: 7X12 6.6 ft tall V Nose Barn Doors Door closer to the front

item.title: Tiny Home/Stealth Camper/Conversion Van Built In 180 Hours
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rWxACxs47BE Where’s Your Neighborhood Published on Feb 20, 2017 SUBSCRIBED 15K Dodge Promaster van converted into a off the grid tiny home on wheels. This project was completed in only 180 hours. I put in 125 hours, My friend who is a contractor put in about 40, and a electrician put in 15. The van was completed in below freezing temps outside in about 50 days. Neighborhoods story and showcaing of the van- https://www.

item.title: Space Efficient Tiny Houses by Minimaliste Homes
item.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DYm4LGU6eGo The Sakura Tiny House was recently completely by Minimaliste Homes in Qu√©bec. The house literally has not only everything you’d except in a traditional home, but it’s all done beautifully with some pretty darn impressive ways of going about it. I’d like to thanks Phil from Minimaliste for putting together this English version of The Sakura tiny house tour, thanks! See link below to their website.
